what do u think of having a sculputer of the 10 commandments on city hall grounds? I personally think that this is exceptable because our laws are based off the last 6 commandments. Please give me your comments.

No I don't think it should be there.
 
 If they want a monument listing the laws than so be it but don't give us a monument showing a government that should have a nuetral stance to religion presenting the first of Gods four commandments.
 
 Why should it be there?
 What possibly reason does it have for being there?

Nope, there is nothing wrong with the 10 commandments i beleve in them even though i do not beleve in god. 
 
 But they have no place in the house of law
 
 i would have no problem with them having a list of federal offenses enscribed in stone there
 
 and i would even be alright if they had the 10 commandments and the laws from all the other major relegions of the world.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  10 Commandments In City Hall
